stimulusHtml: Which of the following Supreme Court cases best justifies the actions taken by law enforcement in this scenario?

features.html: A group unhappy with local law enforcement distributes a memo to members encouraging physical confrontations with police officers. The leaders of the group are promptly arrested.

choicesHtml: Tinker v. Des Moines Independent Community School District (1969)
Engel v. Vitale (1962)
New York Times v. United States (1971)
Schenck v. United States (1919)
